description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Corn Puree recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baby food,Pescatarian,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Sweet Corn Puree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a small knife, cut kernels from 3 sweet corn cobs (about 500g). Cook in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender. Drain well.
Pur√©e 3/4 cup of the cooked corn with 80g ricotta until desired consistency for baby's developmental age. Serve. Note: Serves 12 quarter cup serves for an infant starting on solids.
